q: Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race." I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1. Kirsten Gillibrand has garnered positive attention recently for her roles in the repeal of the don't ask, don't tell law for gay troops and the passage of legislation to provide benefits to Sept. 11 responders. The poll found 52% of those surveyed saying they would re-elect Kirsten Gillibrand . She faces re-election in 2012.
